# 1. 

Differentiate each function

a. $f(x) = (5x^4+1)^2$

b. $g(x) =\displaystyle (4x^5-1)\sqrt[3]{x+1}$

c. $y = (3x-1)(-3x^2-4)^{-3}$

d. $f(x) = \displaystyle\left(\frac{x^5+4}{x^2-5}\right)^{1/5}$

e. $y = \displaystyle \sqrt[5]{-x^3-4}$

f. $y = \displaystyle \sqrt{-x^4-1}(-x-2)$

g. $f(x) = \displaystyle \left( \frac{5x^5-3}{-3x^3+1}\right)^3$
   
**answers**:

a. $40x^3(5x^4+1)$
b. $\displaystyle\frac{64x^5+60x^4-1}{3(x+1)^{2/3}}$
c. $\displaystyle\frac{3(15x^2-6x-4)}{(-3x^2-4)^4}$
d. $\displaystyle\frac{x(3x^5-25x^3-8)}{5(x^5+4)^{4/5}(x^2-5)^{6/5}}$
e. $-\displaystyle\frac{3x^2}{5(-x^3-4)^{4/5}}$
f. $\displaystyle\frac{(x+1)^2(3x^2-2x+1)}{(-x^4-1)^{1/2}}$
